text: Vinai Venkatesham is a British football administrator and Chief Executive of Arsenal Football Club. An employee of Arsenal F.C. since 2010 in a variety of roles, he was appointed Managing Director to replace the outgoing Ivan Gazidis. Immediately before the promotion, he was the chief commercial officer. Venkatesham is of Indian origin. He worked on London 2012 prior to joining Arsenal, and is currently a non-executive director of the British Olympic Association. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Arsenal F.C. directors and chairmen Category:British people of Indian descent
title: Vinai Venkatesham
